title.instructions: Act as a marketing strategist. Write an attention-grabbing header to promote the benefit of the service. Use persuasive and targeted language for potential customers to pique their interest. The header should be limited to 60 characters and highlight the positive effects on their homes or businesses. Write in a sentence-case format with no colon or vertical bar. Do not use the same keyword twice.

callToAction.value: Our deluxe window cleaning package protects you for up to 2 days following your service, and our premium window cleaning package protects you for up to 5 days! If it rains in the days following your window cleaning service, and you call in that time period, we will return and touch up your affected windows for free!
callToAction.instructions: Act as a marketing strategist focused on lead generation. Write an attention-grabbing very short paragraph to promote the services. Do not use the same keyword twice.

image.instructions: An image url to a picture that will be displayed on the call to action page with a 5:4 aspect ratio

buttonText.instructions: A short call to action that will be displayed on the button.
